name: The Explicitly Only Public Domain Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
name_original: The Explicitly Only Public Domain Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
description:
Controls;

- Left click to interact with highlighted objects

- Hold Enter to highlight all interactable objects

A tutorial level for a silly idea for a Sherlock Holmes  game I had so that I could test out creating the systems for a point and click adventure game. 

As the worlds greatest detective you must solve a currently un-determined mystery whilst contending with the greatest evil of our time: overly letigious copyright owners *shudders*.

Context;

https://www.theverge.com/2020/6/25/21302942/netflix-enola-holmes-sherlock-arthur...

https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/6956021-Sherlock.html
